results.content: Sometimes, the explanations are done at quite a speed, so a quick summary of what's discussed in a video would then be helpful.

results.content: Voice not clear.Cannot hear anything. Instructor's navigation is confusing and unclear all the time. No practice at all.
results.content_html: Voice not clear.Cannot hear anything. Instructor's navigation is confusing and unclear all the time. No practice at all.

results.content: The speaking is not very clear & fluid. I wouldn't class these first few videos as lessons either, they are just talking about a few 'recommended' products which could have been listed and discussed briefly.

response.content:
Hi Sam, the first videos are there as instructions and are also free. Something that is pretty common to various courses, at least those that I've seen.

Since English is not my native language, you might have a little bit of difficulty understanding but I've never had problems in communications so far :) Thanks for the feedback and I'll try to make better each new course I do.

The last sections (menu and events plugins) were recorded with a much better microphone so that might also help :)

You're free to visit my YouTube channel also to find various tutorials on WordPress.
